name: Gizmodo Trimmed 2019 (Kotaku, The Onion, Kinja)
description:
Trim the fat from the 2015 design of Kinja/Gawker sites (kotaku, io9, lifehacker, etc). Remove ads and the left sidebar, for wider viewing.

Click here to combine with my rad Gawker/Kinja Dark Style
additional_info: -2017- Oct 26 - Added some new Gawker sites to the list. July 18 - Minor fix and disabled infinite scrolling (which you can re-enable by deleting the first line of the source if you desire). July 9 - Trying to get rid of adblock overlay, but its css code might be randomly generated, which makes that difficult. May 15 - Small fix. May 5 - Just made the wide view slightly less wide. You can edit it to your desires in the css. March 26 - Minor fix. March 24 - Rewrote a lot of the css for simplicity and fixes. March 13 - Removed another deal ad, widened the view area a bit. Created a new Dark Style. -2016- Nov 22 - Fixes made. Sorry it took me so long! May 28 - Removed some "sponsored" and "deals" ads. May 16 - Stickied nav bar, as per Stefan's suggestion. March 24 - Removed "Kinja Deals" and Commerce inserts. March 21 - Removed billboard element at top of some pages. March 15 - More tweaks and fixes. March 13 - Mobile view fixes. Removed footers, cause who cares? -2015- July 20 - Removed floating bar on mobile view. Sept 1 - Updated with fixes. Sept 3 - Minor fixes. Sept 17 - Widened text area. Sept 19 - Fixed a little problem with the mobile view and got rid of a border. Dec 26 - Quick fix. Happy holidays!
